channel.title: Syi Protection
channel.description:
So currently i have this
public boolean process
[code] if (playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("'") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("|") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("(") || playerName.contains(")") || playerName.contains(";") || playerName.contains(":")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } [/code]
is this the best way or is there a better way?

item.title: Syi Protection
item.dc:creator: @jonta_knight jonta knight
item.description:
@jonta_knight wrote:

Sorry for the crappy coder question but where would you find [quote=“runormal, post:1, topic:198464”]public boolean process

if (playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("'") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("|") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("(") || playerName.contains(")") || playerName.contains(";") || playerName.contains(":")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } [/quote]
Cus personly im gettting quite annoiyed about it i would love to be face to face with the person who created SYI!!

Read full topic

item.title: Syi Protection
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

private boolean isIllegal(String playerName) { char[] plyr = playerName.toCharArray(); for(byte i = 0; i < plyr.length; i++) { if(Character.isLetterOrDigit(plyr[i]) && Character.isWhitespace(plyr[i])) { return true; } } return false; }

And to invoke it, too check, invoke it like this:

if(isIllegal(playerName)) { // it is illegal } else { //it isn't }

Read full topic

item.title: Syi Protection
item.dc:creator: @runormal runormal
item.description:
@runormal wrote:

So currently i have this

public boolean process

if (playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("SYI")
|| playerName.contains("'") || playerName.contains("syi")
|| playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("@")
|| playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-")
|| playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<")
|| playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains(",")
|| playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("]")
|| playerName.contains("|") || playerName.contains("{")
|| playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("?")
|| playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$")
|| playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^")
|| playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*")
|| playerName.contains("(") || playerName.contains(")")
|| playerName.contains(";") || playerName.contains(":")) {
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}

is this the best way or is there a better way?

Read full topic
